pp1.1:2.2.pli: khandhapaññatti, āyatanapaññatti, dhātupaññatti, saccapaññatti, indriyapaññatti, puggalapaññattīti.

pp1.1:4.3.pli: cakkhāyatanaṃ, rūpāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, saddāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ, dhammāyatanaṃ;

pp1.1:5.3.pli: cakkhudhātu, rūpadhātu, cakkhuviññāṇadhātu, sotadhātu, saddadhātu, sotaviññāṇadhātu, ghānadhātu, gandhadhātu, ghānaviññāṇadhātu, jivhādhātu, rasadhātu, jivhāviññāṇadhātu, kāyadhātu, phoṭṭhabbadhātu, kāyaviññāṇadhātu, manodhātu, dhammadhātu, manoviññāṇadhātu;

pp1.1:7.3.pli: cakkhundriyaṃ, sotindriyaṃ, ghānindriyaṃ, jivhindriyaṃ, kāyindriyaṃ, manindriyaṃ, itthindriyaṃ, purisindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ, sukhindriyaṃ, dukkhindriyaṃ, somanassindriyaṃ, domanassindriyaṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ, saddhindriyaṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ, paññindriyaṃ, anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ, aññindriyaṃ, aññātāvindriyaṃ;

pp1.10:2.1.pli: Pañcannaṃ idha niṭṭhā, pañcannaṃ idha vihāya niṭṭhā.

pp1.2:8.1.pli: Indriyesu aguttadvāro ca, bhojane amattaññū ca.

pp1.2:18.1.pli: Indriyesu guttadvāro ca, bhojane mattaññū ca.

pp1.3:6.1.pli: Arukūpamacitto puggalo, vijjūpamacitto puggalo, vajirūpamacitto puggalo.

pp1.3:8.1.pli: Avakujjapañño puggalo, ucchaṅgapañño puggalo, puthupañño puggalo.

pp1.3:9.1.pli: Atthekacco puggalo kāmesu ca bhavesu ca avītarāgo, atthekacco puggalo kāmesu vītarāgo bhavesu avītarāgo, atthekacco puggalo kāmesu ca bhavesu ca vītarāgo.

pp1.3:10.1.pli: Pāsāṇalekhūpamo puggalo, pathavilekhūpamo puggalo, udakalekhūpamo puggalo.

pp1.3:14.1.pli: Atthekacco puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo, atthekacco puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo, atthekacco puggalo sakkatvā garuṃ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.

pp1.3:15.1.pli: Atthekacco puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo, atthekacco puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo;

pp1.3:16.1.pli: Atthekacco puggalo sīlesu paripūrakārī, samādhismiṃ mattaso kārī, paññāya mattaso kārī;

pp1.3:16.2.pli: atthekacco puggalo sīlesu ca paripūrakārī, samādhismiñca paripūrakārī, paññāya mattaso kārī;

pp1.3:16.3.pli: atthekacco puggalo sīlesu ca paripūrakārī, samādhismiñca paripūrakārī, paññāya ca paripūrakārī.

pp1.4:2.1.pli: Asappuriso, asappurisena asappurisataro, sappuriso, sappurisena sappurisataro.

pp1.4:3.1.pli: Pāpo, pāpena pāpataro, kalyāṇo, kalyāṇena kalyāṇataro.

pp1.4:4.1.pli: Pāpadhammo, pāpadhammena pāpadhammataro, kalyāṇadhammo, kalyāṇadhammena kalyāṇadhammataro.

pp1.4:7.1.pli: Yuttappaṭibhāno, no muttappaṭibhāno, muttappaṭibhāno, no yuttappaṭibhāno, yuttappaṭibhāno ca muttappaṭibhāno ca, neva yuttappaṭibhāno no muttappaṭibhāno.

pp1.4:16.1.pli: Atthekacco puggalo ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā avaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti, atthekacco puggalo ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā vaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti, atthekacco puggalo ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃsitā hoti, atthekacco puggalo ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṃ upadaṃsitā hoti.

pp1.4:17.1.pli: Atthekacco puggalo anuvicca pariyogāhetvā avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti, atthekacco puggalo anuvicca pariyogāhetvā vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti, atthekacco puggalo anuvicca pariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṃ upadaṃsitā hoti, atthekacco puggalo anuvicca pariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃsitā hoti.

pp1.4:18.1.pli: Atthekacco puggalo avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena, no ca kho vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena;

pp1.4:18.2.pli: atthekacco puggalo vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena, no ca kho avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena;

pp1.4:18.3.pli: atthekacco puggalo avaṇṇārahassa ca avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena;

pp1.4:18.4.pli: vaṇṇārahassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena, atthekacco puggalo neva avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena, no ca vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena.

pp1.4:19.1.pli: Uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvī no puññaphalūpajīvī, puññaphalūpajīvī no uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvī, uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvī ca puññaphalūpajīvī ca, neva uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvī no puññaphalūpajīvī.

pp1.4:20.1.pli: Tamo tamaparāyano, tamo jotiparāyano, joti tamaparāyano, joti jotiparāyano.

pp1.4:25.1.pli: Atthekacco puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya;

pp1.4:25.2.pli: atthekacco puggalo parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no attahitāya;

pp1.4:25.3.pli: atthekacco puggalo attahitāya ceva paṭipanno hoti parahitāya ca;

pp1.4:25.4.pli: atthekacco puggalo neva attahitāya paṭipanno hoti no parahitāya.

pp1.4:26.3.pli: atthekacco puggalo attantapo ca hoti attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto, parantapo ca paraparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto;

pp1.4:26.4.pli: atthekacco puggalo neva attantapo hoti na attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto, na parantapo na paraparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto.

pp1.4:26.5.pli: So anattantapo aparantapo diṭṭheva dhamme nicchāto nibbuto sītībhūto sukhappaṭisaṃvedī brahmabhūtena attanā viharati.

pp1.4:28.1.pli: Atthekacco puggalo lābhī hoti ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa, na lābhī adhipaññādhammavipassanāya;

pp1.4:28.2.pli: atthekacco puggalo lābhī hoti adhipaññādhammavipassanāya, na lābhī ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa;

pp1.4:28.3.pli: atthekacco puggalo lābhī ceva hoti ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa, lābhī ca adhipaññādhammavipassanāya;

pp1.4:28.4.pli: atthekacco puggalo neva lābhī hoti ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassa, na lābhī adhipaññādhammavipassanāya.

pp1.4:29.1.pli: Anusotagāmī puggalo, paṭisotagāmī puggalo, ṭhitatto puggalo, tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo.

pp1.4:30.1.pli: Appassuto sutena anupapanno, appassuto sutena upapanno, bahussuto sutena anupapanno, bahussuto sutena upapanno.

pp1.5:2.1.pli: Atthekacco puggalo ārabhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hoti, tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti, yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.

pp1.5:2.2.pli: Atthekacco puggalo ārabhati na vippaṭisārī ca hoti, tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti, yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.

pp1.5:2.3.pli: Atthekacco puggalo nārabhati vippaṭisārī ca hoti, tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti, yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.

pp1.5:2.4.pli: Atthekacco puggalo nārabhati na vippaṭisārī hoti, tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti, yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.

pp1.5:2.5.pli: Atthekacco puggalo nārabhati na vippaṭisārī hoti, tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.

pp1.5:3.1.pli: Datvā avajānāti, saṃvāsena avajānāti, ādheyyamukho hoti, lolo hoti, mando momūho hoti.

pp1.6:2.1.pli: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhati, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇāti balesu ca vasībhāvaṃ.

pp1.6:2.2.pli: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhati, na ca tattha sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇāti na ca balesu vasībhāvaṃ.

pp1.6:2.3.pli: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni anabhisambujjhati, diṭṭhe ceva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti sāvakapāramiñca pāpuṇāti.

pp1.6:2.4.pli: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni anabhisambujjhati, diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti, na ca sāvakapāramiṃ pāpuṇāti.

pp1.6:2.5.pli: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni anabhisambujjhati, na ca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti, anāgāmī hoti anāgantā itthattaṃ.

pp1.6:2.6.pli: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni anabhisambujjhati, na ca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti, āgāmī hoti āgantā itthattaṃ.

pp1.7:2.2.pli: Sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggova hoti, ummujjitvā nimujjati, ummujjitvā ṭhito hoti, ummujjitvā vipassati viloketi, ummujjitvā patarati, ummujjitvā patigādhappatto hoti, ummujjitvā tiṇṇo hoti pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo.

pp1.7:3.1.pli: Ubhatobhāgavimutto, paññāvimutto, kāyasakkhī, diṭṭhippatto, saddhāvimutto, dhammānusārī, saddhānusārī.

pp1.9:2.1.pli: Sammāsambuddho, paccekasambuddho, ubhatobhāgavimutto, paññāvimutto, kāyasakkhī, diṭṭhippatto, saddhāvimutto, dhammānusārī, saddhānusārī.

pp2.1:1.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo kālena kālaṃ samayena samayaṃ aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti—

pp2.1:2.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo na heva kho kālena kālaṃ samayena samayaṃ aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti—

pp2.1:3.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā arūpasahagatānaṃ vā samāpattīnaṃ.

pp2.1:3.3.pli: So ca kho na nikāmalābhī hoti na akicchalābhī na akasiralābhī;

pp2.1:3.4.pli: na yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ samāpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi.

pp2.1:3.5.pli: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ tassa puggalassa pamādamāgamma tā samāpattiyo kuppeyyuṃ—

pp2.1:4.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā arūpasahagatānaṃ vā samāpattīnaṃ.

pp2.1:4.3.pli: So ca kho nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;

pp2.1:4.5.pli: Aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso yaṃ tassa puggalassa pamādamāgamma tā samāpattiyo kuppeyyuṃ—

pp2.1:5.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā arūpasahagatānaṃ vā samāpattīnaṃ.

pp2.1:5.3.pli: So ca kho na nikāmalābhī hoti na akicchalābhī na akasiralābhī;

pp2.1:5.4.pli: na yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ samāpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi.

pp2.1:5.5.pli: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ so puggalo pamādamāgamma tāhi samāpattīhi parihāyeyya—

pp2.1:6.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā arūpasahagatānaṃ vā samāpattīnaṃ.

pp2.1:6.3.pli: So ca kho nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;

pp2.1:6.5.pli: Aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso yaṃ so puggalo pamādamāgamma tāhi samāpattīhi parihāyeyya—

pp2.1:7.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā arūpasahagatānaṃ vā samāpattīnaṃ.

pp2.1:7.3.pli: So ca kho na nikāmalābhī hoti na akicchalābhī na akasiralābhī;

pp2.1:7.4.pli: na yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ samāpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi.

pp2.1:7.5.pli: Sace anusañceteti, na parihāyati tāhi samāpattīhi.

pp2.1:7.6.pli: Sace na anusañceteti, parihāyati tāhi samāpattīhi—

pp2.1:8.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā arūpasahagatānaṃ vā samāpattīnaṃ.

pp2.1:8.3.pli: So ca kho na nikāmalābhī hoti na akicchalābhī na akasiralābhī;

pp2.1:8.4.pli: na yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ samāpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi.

pp2.1:8.5.pli: Sace anurakkhati, na parihāyati tāhi samāpattīhi.

pp2.1:8.6.pli: Sace na anurakkhati, parihāyati tāhi samāpattīhi—

pp2.1:9.3.pli: na ca tesaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya paṭipanno—

pp2.1:10.2.pli: Yesaṃ dhammānaṃ samanantarā ariyadhammassa avakkanti hoti tehi dhammehi samannāgato—

pp2.1:11.2.pli: Satta sekkhā bhayūparatā, ye ca puthujjanā sīlavanto.

pp2.1:12.2.pli: Ye te puggalā kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā, kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā, vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā, assaddhā acchandikā duppaññā eḷā, abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ—

pp2.1:13.2.pli: Ye te puggalā na kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā, na kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā, na vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā, saddhā chandikā paññavanto aneḷā, bhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ—

pp2.1:14.2.pli: Pañca puggalā ānantarikā, ye ca micchādiṭṭhikā niyatā, aṭṭha ca ariyapuggalā niyatā.

pp2.1:15.2.pli: Cattāro maggasamaṅgino puggalā paṭipannakā, cattāro phalasamaṅgino puggalā phale ṭhitā.

pp2.1:16.2.pli: Yassa puggalassa apubbaṃ acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañca—

pp2.1:17.2.pli: Ayañca puggalo sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno assa, kappassa ca uḍḍayhanavelā assa, neva tāva kappo uḍḍayheyya yāvāyaṃ puggalo na sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikaroti.

pp2.1:22.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhati;

pp2.1:22.3.pli: tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇāti, balesu ca vasībhāvaṃ—

pp2.1:23.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhati;

pp2.1:23.3.pli: na ca tattha sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇāti, na ca balesu vasībhāvaṃ—

pp2.1:24.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati;

pp2.1:24.3.pli: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti—

pp2.1:25.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo na heva kho aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati;

pp2.1:25.3.pli: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.

pp2.1:26.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati;

pp2.1:26.3.pli: paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.

pp2.1:27.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo “idaṃ dukkhan”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.

pp2.1:27.3.pli: Tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā.

pp2.1:27.4.pli: Paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti—

pp2.1:28.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo “idaṃ dukkhan”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.

pp2.1:28.3.pli: Tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā.

pp2.1:28.4.pli: Paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti, no ca kho yathā diṭṭhippattassa—

pp2.1:29.2.pli: Yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti, paññāvāhiṃ paññāpubbaṅgamaṃ ariyamaggaṃ bhāveti—

pp2.1:29.4.pli: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dhammānusārī phale ṭhito diṭṭhippatto.

pp2.1:30.2.pli: Yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti, saddhāvāhiṃ saddhāpubbaṅgamaṃ ariyamaggaṃ bhāveti—

pp2.1:30.4.pli: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo saddhānusārī phale ṭhito saddhāvimutto.

pp2.1:31.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano.

pp2.1:31.3.pli: So sattakkhattuṃ deve ca mānuse ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti—

pp2.1:32.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano.

pp2.1:32.3.pli: So dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti—

pp2.1:33.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano.

pp2.1:33.3.pli: So ekaṃyeva mānusakaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti—

pp2.1:34.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti, sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti—

pp2.1:35.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti, tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā—

pp2.1:36.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti, tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.

pp2.1:36.3.pli: So upapannaṃ vā samanantarā appattaṃ vā vemajjhaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ ariyamaggaṃ sañjaneti upariṭṭhimānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya—

pp2.1:37.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti, tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.

pp2.1:37.3.pli: So atikkamitvā vemajjhaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ upahacca vā kālakiriyaṃ ariyamaggaṃ sañjaneti upariṭṭhimānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya—

pp2.1:38.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti, tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.

pp2.1:38.3.pli: So asaṅkhārena ariyamaggaṃ sañjaneti upariṭṭhimānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya—

pp2.1:39.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti, tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.

pp2.1:39.3.pli: So sasaṅkhārena ariyamaggaṃ sañjaneti upariṭṭhimānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya—

pp2.1:40.2.pli: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti, tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.

pp2.1:40.3.pli: So avihā cuto atappaṃ gacchati, atappā cuto sudassaṃ gacchati, sudassā cuto sudassiṃ gacchati, sudassiyā cuto akaniṭṭhaṃ gacchati;

pp2.1:40.4.pli: akaniṭṭhe ariyamaggaṃ sañjaneti upariṭṭhimānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya—

pp2.1:41.1.pli: Katamo ca puggalo sotāpanno sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno?

pp2.1:41.2.pli: Tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno.

pp2.1:42.1.pli: Kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvāya paṭipanno puggalo sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno.

pp2.1:43.1.pli: Kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ anavasesappahānāya paṭipanno puggalo anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno.

pp2.1:44.1.pli: Rūparāgaarūparāgamānauddhaccaavijjāya anavasesappahānāya paṭipanno puggalo arahattaphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno.

pp2.1:44.2.pli: Yassa puggalassa rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccaṃ avijjā anavasesā pahīnā—

pp2.10:1.2.pli: Sattakkhattuparamassa, kolaṅkolassa, ekabījissa, sakadāgāmissa, yo ca diṭṭheva dhamme arahā—

pp2.10:2.2.pli: Antarāparinibbāyissa, upahaccaparinibbāyissa, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa, uddhaṃsotassa akaniṭṭhagāmino—
